QuestData.Title: Temporal Difficulties
QuestData.Description:
Hello, $c. You're right on time!
Some trouble up at the temple is causing the timeways to destabilize and spill out into the valley. Not only that, but a bunch of Timewalkers are missing!
We've asked for extra help, but one of the new recruits hasn't arrived yet.
Can you look for her? Be careful though, time's in a massive state of flux around the valley. There's no knowing what dangers are around!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the missing recruit in the Flowing Forest in Thaldraszus.
QuestData.RewardText: I knew somebody would come around... eventually!
